description: Students work in groups on substantial problems posed by, and of current interest to, area businesses and government agencies. The student groups decide on promising approaches to their problem and carry out the necessary investigations with minimal faculty involvement. Each group reports the results of its investigations with a paper and an hour-long presentation to the sponsoring organization. Prerequisite: Permission of instructor. Offered annually during Interim.
name: Mathematics Practicum
notes: Registration by permission of instructor only.
prerequisites: Permission of instructor. Offered annually during Interim.
